title: Snapchat: How can I fix so that my froncamera/selfiecamera uses the HLDR/Visual core feature?
content:
How can I fix so that my froncamera/selfiecamera uses the HLDR/Visual core feature when taking selfies within Snapchat?

The back camera takes amazing pictures within Snapchat, but, the frontcamera is just not good. I hope there is a way to fix this, and that I have missed an update, a certain setting or something to take better selfies within Snapchat.

I have the latest update from Snapchat (April 20th, 2020)
I have the latest version of Android (Android version 10. Android security patch level March 5, 2020. Google play system update March 1, 2020)
